CustomField.description: Shows Definition of the "Discount Reason" field above
CustomField.formula: CASE(Discount_Reason__c, "Accelerate Sale", $Label.Discount_Reason_Accelerate_Sale, "Budget Constraint", $Label.Discount_Reason_Budget_Constraint, "Channel Partner Demo Program", $Label.Discount_Reason_Channel_Partner_Demo_Program, "Competitive Pressure", $Label.Discount_Reason_Competitive_pressure, "Cross Sell/Upsell", $Label.Discount_Reason_Upselling_discount, "Modified Marketing Promo", $Label.Discount_Reason_Modified_Marketing_Promo, "Pricing limited by regulation or policy", $Label.Discount_Reason_Pricing_limited_by_regulation, "See No Charge Product Category", $Label.Discount_Reason_See_No_Charge_Product_Category, "Volume/Tier Pricing", $Label.Discount_Reason_Volume_pricing, null)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Shows definition of the "Discount Reason" field, if available
CustomField.label: Discount Reason Definition
